# `bbva-amount`

## `Semantic Dom`

####   `DOM - Structure test`

```html
<bbva-amount>
</bbva-amount>

```

####   `SHADOW DOM - Structure test`

```html
<span class="sr-only">
  .00 €
</span>
<span
  aria-hidden="true"
  class="amount-wrapper"
>
  <span class="currency currency-right">
    €
  </span>
</span>

```
